repo_notes.author: stevenhao
repo_notes.content: set is a game i wrote in college to help learn webdev. it's coffeescript cause that was all the rage back then. anyway, it lets you play set & variations like powerset in the browser. powerset is the one i find the most fun & arguably the one i spent most time on.
